# Temporary CI requirements while ANTA integration is in preview state.
# Once the integration is final, this file can be removed and the regular requirements can include ANTA.
# Installing PyAVD from source.
# The package path below is relative to the repo root and will only work if the pip install is executed from there.
./python-avd
# The -r path is relative to this file.
-r ../ansible_collections/arista/avd/roles/eos_validate_state/preview_requirements.txt
